meanings.definition: A person who walks around a store or building to assist customers.
meanings.sent1: The floorwalkers at the store helped customers find products.
meanings.sent2: I saw the floorwalkers guiding shoppers to different sections of the mall.
meanings.sent3: The floorwalkers raced each other to see who could help the most customers.
meanings.sent4: The floorwalkers were like friendly guides in a maze of shopping aisles.
meanings.sent5: The image of floorwalkers assisting customers stayed in my mind long after I left the store.

meanings.definition: The act of walking around a store or building to assist customers.
meanings.sent1: During the busy holiday season, the floorwalkers were constantly on the move.
meanings.sent2: The efficiency of the floorwalkers improved the overall shopping experience.
meanings.sent3: The floorwalkers' synchronized dance moves while assisting customers brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The floorwalkers' footsteps echoed through the store like a rhythmic drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the floorwalkers to helping customers was truly admirable.
